Author: boxalex#9950
Content: Any idea when binance enables withdraws/deposits again. In the haste i have "evacuated" all my KMD to Binance right bevor they disabled the deposit. However, naturally i would like to have to stake them, hence the question, any talks with Binance when they plan to active withdraws again?

Content: that's good news, thanks a lot

Content: been scared of "may take months" :))

Author: akaneo#3021
Content: also, what will happen with the stake ? will be lost ?

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: we're working hard to get it done as soon as possible so we can get back to working on  all the cool tech we have that is nearing release, and so the transtion to the next notray season goes smoothly as possible.

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: not 100% sure on the status of rewards acrued in the interim. Don't quote me, but it may be contributed to covering the losses of those whose funds were swept up by the hacker before we had a chance to do so. It all depends on the relative values which are yet to be determined as we go through all the claims.

Author: akaneo#3021
Content: ok

Author: akaneo#3021
Content: thats fair

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: AFAIK we recovered around 90% of funds at risk

Author: akaneo#3021
Content: thanks for saving my coins, hopefully this wont be needed again

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: no worries, thanks for patience and understanding during this unfortunate event. Rest assured we maintain a very high priority on security and the wellbeing of our community.
